metadata.title: CVE-2024-53162 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:crypto: qat/qat_4xxx - fix off by one in uof_get_name()The fw_objs[] array has "num_objs" elements so the > needs to be >= toprevent an out of bounds read.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
